channel.title: A confession for the community!
channel.description:
Hey everyone!
I just want to let you know that I havent been 100% honest about my identity. I am actually, Jaffa, who decided to leave a while ago.
I felt mistreaded and also wasnt too nice about the whole deal myself, but I think it is best to move on. I have given technobear and also Johannes an apology in PM, which Johannes accepted.
And I dont really want to "sneak around", so I thought i'd let you all know who I am. If you dont accept it, I respect that. I think I have always contributed a lot for this forum, I was on board from the beginning, from the crowd funding campaign. I will continue to contribute, unless everyone in here is utterly against it.
Well, that was basicly it. Let me know what you think.
Have a good day from Jaffa, (grimm reefer)

item.title: A confession for the community!
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Thanks TB, I look forward to be back in the community

In almost any other community forum or whtever I have been involved in, I am called jaffa or jaffasplaffa, so Ill probably make a new one for the future.

Read full topic

item.title: A confession for the community!
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Welcome back Jaffa, looking forward to your contributions.

Read full topic

item.title: A confession for the community!
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Wise said @johannes

Thanks again!

Read full topic

item.title: A confession for the community!
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

As said in PM, apologies accepted

grimmreefer:

Let me know what you think.

Sorry, please, let's not turn this into another polarizing thread. If you need to respond, I'd suggest to do that via PM.

Let's all move on in a positive manner and further discuss patching, playing, tweaking hacking.

Read full topic

item.title: A confession for the community!
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Thanks, I appreciate it, @Reggie

I do also apologize to those effected from this, besides Johannes and Technobear.

Read full topic

item.title: A confession for the community!
item.dc:creator: @Reggie
item.description:
@Reggie wrote:

I wasn't here for all the kerfuffle so it didn't personally affect me but it's good to see that you've made peace with people and personally I think it's good to see you back on the forum.

Read full topic
